title: Ighalo extends stay in Saudi Arabia after signing deal with Al Wehda
snippet: Nigerian striker Odion Ighalo is set to extend his stay in the lucrative Saudi Pro League after agreeing to a deal with another club, Al Wehda, in the oil-rich country.

title: Odion Ighalo bags assist to power Al Wehda past Damac
snippet: In Saudi Arabia, Odion Ighalo was able the hero as Al Wehda defeats Damac.

title: Odion Ighalo - Wikipedia
snippet: On 15 August 2023, Ighalo joined Al-Wehda on a free transfer.
